summary.title: Initial Threat Model
summary.description: This threat model analyzes the StellarPay Digital Banking web platform, which facilitates user registration, money transfers, account management, and real-time financial services. The model focuses on securing data flows, APIs, and user authentication using the STRIDE framework.

diagrams.title: StellarPay Platform Diagram
diagrams.description: Users (external entity)  Web App (process)  Database (data store)  API Gateway (process)  Payment Gateway (external entity)  Data flows between them  Trust boundaries to separate external and internal systems

diagrams.title: StellarPay Web App Architecture
diagrams.description: Customer → StellarPay Web App Label: Login / Payment Request  StellarPay Web App → Auth API Label: Authentication Request  Auth API → User DB Label: Credential Validation  StellarPay Web App → Transaction API Label: Payment Instructions  Transaction API → Transaction DB Label: Log Transaction  Transaction API → Payment Gateway Label: Payment Request  Payment Gateway → Transaction API Label: Payment Status
